name: Retro Ball
overview: Retro Ball is a 2-player only competitive air hockey game. Each player controls the respective paddle on their side, and can use it to push the puck around the air hockey table. A point is scored when the puck is placed in the opposing team's net. At the beginning of each game, there is a toss-up to see who goes first. This is repeated if the puck becomes stuck on the center-line. Each game is timed, with the goal to outscore the other player. Players can choose from a fast or slow puck, to change game speed.
